entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 09:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -29.0°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -32.3°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
